short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows a count of tokens in the selected text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your text analysis with the 'GPT Sidebar Token Counter'. Instantly get the token count for selected English and Chinese text, optimized for ChatGPT. Simple, fast, and efficient. Perfect for linguists, AI developers, and text analytics enthusiasts
